In the episode, titled MEAN SOCCER WEEK, Calamity cleans during busy time at Jeff's gym (which is entering bankruptcy), so when he crosses bats during play he turns two old ladies (named Maggie and Mae) on their heads. Snow White is in my opinion a bad movie on an artistic point of view. The plot is pretty much foreseeable, the characters are stereotypes, the editing too. But it’s got vibes that pulls you from one end to another thanks to alot off incredible work by Linda Blair and al lot off parody moments that cover this somehow with irony.

Michael Dudikoff stars as Joe Armstrong a martial artist who fights ninjas who are stealing weapons from the U.S Army, in this entertaining yet admittedly brainless comedic action film. This film is clearly an attempt to create a Jackie Chan character but has just as much humor, bad dubbing (though this isn’t so noticeable if you’re not concentrating), and martial arts with flesh eating piranhas!
